channel.title: Great way to learn german
channel.description:
[url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/languages/german/]www.bbc.co.uk/languages/german/[/url]
they sent you weekly tips/sentences and stuff only takes about 15 to complete and very very effective way of learing. this is only if your interested in self learning german but i think they send you out a certificate when you complete it. and yes its all free.

item.title: Great way to learn german
item.dc:creator: @Scartastic Scartastic
item.description:
@Scartastic wrote:

the fu superior:

Why would someone want to learn German? Yell and say “bah!” as loud as you can, there you go, you know how to speak German

Pretty much. I hate German too >=(

Read full topic

item.title: Great way to learn german
item.dc:creator: @Scartastic Scartastic
item.description:
@Scartastic wrote:

Wisst ihr was. Wenn man es lernen möchte, ist es am einfachsten, wenn man in der Schweiz oder in Deutschland wohnt, dort muss man es einfach können.

Well, I learned German easily… I lived in Switzerland, Im pretty good 8)
